short_answer.name: Oyo (Oravel Stays Pvt. Ltd. / Oyo Hotels & Homes)
short_answer.is_red_flag: Yes — multiple legal, regulatory, and reputational issues suggest caution and requirement for Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD).
short_answer.summary: Oyo has been repeatedly exposed in adverse media, legal cases (FIRs, partner disputes, regulatory scrutiny), allegations of inflated financials/fake bookings, partner dissatisfaction, and IPO / governance concerns. While there is no known sanctions listing, the pattern of disputes and discrepancies imposes substantive risk for any financial or partnership exposure.

basic_information.primary business: Hospitality / Budget hotel aggregator and operator

pep_status.status: No evidence (open-source) that Oyo is a PEP
pep_status.details: No public record of ownership by or senior leadership overlap with known Politically Exposed Persons; the founder is a private entrepreneur.

sanctions_watchlists.status: No known matches in open-source checks
sanctions_watchlists.details: No credible data found that Oyo or its executives are on OFAC / UN / EU sanctions lists in recent searches. Vendor/official screening still needed.

details.case: Jaipur FIR (Samskara Resort) alleging fake bookings inflated to generate GST liability, and charges of cheating, forgery, criminal breach of trust. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
Unauthorized hotels using Oyo branding, leading to police action / legal notices in Ghaziabad. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}
Zostel / ZO Rooms disputes: allegations of misuse of data, disagreement over due diligence in acquisition, claims of unfairness. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
Partner hotel complaints: invalid NOCs, high commissions, wrongful withholding of payments or misreporting. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}

criminal_records.status: Some FIRs / legal complaints (pending), but no publicly confirmed criminal convictions (open source)
criminal_records.details: The Jaipur FIR over fake bookings is active; other complaints exist but outcome/resolution is not fully transparent in public sources. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

financial_profile.details: Persistent losses; revenue drop (as reported); high dependency on investor funding; challenging partner relations; delays / cancellations in IPO filings due to financials or investor objections. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

ubo_and_corporate_linkages.details: Oyo has multiple entities/subsidiaries, brand licensing, presumably multiple jurisdictions. Need to verify all beneficial owners, controlling shareholders, especially major investors (SoftBank etc.).

transactional_red_flags.details: Allegations of inflated booking reports, fake or unavailable rooms listed, commission dilution or misreporting, partner claims of withheld payments. :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}

risk_assessment_summary.risk_reasoning: While no verifiable sanctions or criminal convictions are fully confirmed in open sources, Oyo has multiple reputational and regulatory issues. Its financial track record, partner disputes, and recent FIRs expose the company to real risk. Any business relationship needs strong EDD.

recommendation.onboarding_decision: Proceed only with Enhanced Due Diligence; for any substantial exposure or counterparties with Oyo, consider higher risk mitigation or possibly decline based on risk appetite.
edd_measures_if_needed: Obtain audited financial statements and cash flow history for the last few years
Assess reports of partner complaints; seek documentary proof from partners
Run formal sanctions / PEP / legal screenings for the entity, its major investors and key management
Verify corporate registration, beneficial ownership, corporate structure, and investor obligations
Review pending legal cases / FIRs, regulatory notices, and risk of liability/costs
